transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir, good morning, kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Ji, Ashutosh baat kar raha hun sir se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji, uh,
(silence)
Executive: Ek minute, main open kar leta hun profile. Abhi aapne uh,
(silence)
Executive: Jo maine us time pe hum discussion hui thi na aur maine bhej rakha tha. Theek hai? Wo ek bar main aapko dikha deta hun kaise kya hota hai. Aur ek bar jo aur bhi profiles hoti hain usme aapke jo bhi products added hain, theek hai? Ek bar usko hum dekh ke aur isko karte hain sir. Theek hai? To abhi aap mere ko 10 minute de sakte hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapko pehle compare karwaunga, ek bar dikhaunga ki kaun kaun se usme products added hain, jo aapme missing hain, theek hai? Wo product ek bar main add karta hun.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur us time pe maine bheja tha uske ek bar pricing aur wo mere ko bata dijiyega, theek hai? Wo whatsapp pe jo bheja tha aapne?
Executive: Haan ji? Haan, wo to maine product ka naam tha, wo to product ka naam hai, pricing ka bhi wahi main kar du kya?
Customer: Pricing bhi bhej do mujhe na, ek do main bata dunga.
Executive: Main main main main abhi bhai usi ke liye na main aapko bol raha hun 10 minute do main aapko abhi ek link bhejta hun, main apni screen share karunga, aap dekh aap dekh ke bata dena mere ko ki sahi hai.
Customer: Whatsapp pe bhejoge na whatsapp pe?
Executive: Ek minute line pe rahiye.
(silence)
Executive: 11:15
Executive: Mail open kariye aap apni.
Customer: Mail to open hi hai.
Executive: Haan ji mail open kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek invitation gaya hoga Ashutosh Pandey ke naam se.
Customer: Hmm, aaya.
(silence)
Customer: Haan, aaya.
(silence)
Executive: Open kariye usko.
Customer: Ye video meeting hogi kya phir?
Executive: Main, haan tabhi main apni screen share karke dikhaunga na main aapko.
(silence)
Customer: Hamara to phone bhi itna down hai ye band ho jayega raste mein.
Executive: Nahi ek bar dekh lijiye 10 10 minute ki baat hai sir charge laga lo.
Customer: Join kar liya meeting mein. Main join kar liya hun meeting ek bar aa jaiye meeting mein.
Customer: Hmm.
(silence)
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
(silence)
Executive: Hello?
(silence)
Executive: [unintelligible]
(silence)
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai na sir?
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss product pricing.

- Customer's phone battery is low.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share screen to compare products.

- Executive sent a meeting invitation to customer's email.



Next Steps: 

- Executive put the call on hold.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pricing, products, screen sharing
